languages.text: "Привилегия говорить что думаешь, не оглядываясь на дипломатию, — дар. Надеюсь, вы цените его".
"The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
languages.original_text: "Привилегия говорить что думаешь, не оглядываясь на дипломатию, — дар. Надеюсь, вы цените его".

traits.locale_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
"The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
"The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
"The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
"The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

languages.text: "Das Privileg, zu sagen, was man denkt, ohne sich um Diplomatie zu scheren, ist ein Geschenk. Eines, das Ihr hoffentlich zu würdigen wisst."
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

traits.locale_text: "Das Privileg, zu sagen, was man denkt, ohne sich um Diplomatie zu scheren, ist ein Geschenk. Eines, das Ihr hoffentlich zu würdigen wisst."

languages.text: « Pouvoir dire tout haut ce que vous pensez au mépris de toute diplomatie est un privilège rare, et j'espère que vous l'appréciez à sa juste valeur. »
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

traits.locale_text: « Pouvoir dire tout haut ce que vous pensez au mépris de toute diplomatie est un privilège rare, et j'espère que vous l'appréciez à sa juste valeur. »

languages.text: «El privilegio de decir lo que piensa sin necesidad de diplomacia es un don. Espero que sepa agradecerlo».
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

traits.locale_text: «El privilegio de decir lo que piensa sin necesidad de diplomacia es un don. Espero que sepa agradecerlo».

languages.text: 「外交を気にせず思ったことを言える特権は贈り物であり、感謝してほしいものだ」
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

traits.locale_text: 「外交を気にせず思ったことを言える特権は贈り物であり、感謝してほしいものだ」

languages.text: “能够畅所欲言，不必考虑措辞是否合适，这样的特权是一种礼物。希望你能对这样的礼物心怀感激。”
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

traits.locale_text: “能够畅所欲言，不必考虑措辞是否合适，这样的特权是一种礼物。希望你能对这样的礼物心怀感激。”

languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."

languages.text: "Diplomasiye hiçbir saygın olmadan düşündüğünü söyleyebilme ayrıcalığı bir lütuftur. Umarım kıymetini bilirsin."
languages.original_text: "The privilege of saying what you think with no regard for diplomacy is a gift, one I hope you appreciate."
